biotools.summary:
One-step biological analysis pipeline for data-independent acquisition and other quantitative proteomics data.

obaDIA takes a FASTA fromat protein sequence file and a fragment-level, peptide-level or protein-level abundance matrix file from data-independent acquisition (DIA) mass spectrometry experiment, and performs differential protein expression analysis, functional annotation and enrichment analysis in a completely automated way.

bioschemas.name: obaDIA
